title: Patrick Lefevere says Mauro Schmid went MIA in Las Vegas while claiming his Garmin was broken
content:
Soudal Quick-Step manager makes varying sounds about some of the many riders set to depart his team.

Read the full article at Patrick Lefevere says Mauro Schmid went MIA in Las Vegas while claiming his Garmin was broken on Velo.
author: sstokes
